title: University Sports Interest Survey

questions.text: What is your name?
What is your age?
What year of university are you in?
Do you play any sports?
Which sports do you play?
How would you rate your skill level in the sport?
How often do you practice your sport?
Do you participate in any team sports?
What is your preferred type of sport?
What time of day do you prefer to practice sports?
Would you be interested in joining a sports club at the university?
What sports equipment do you currently own?
Would you prefer to train indoors or outdoors?
How important is fitness to you?
Have you attended any university sports events?
If yes, how would you rate the events?
What type of sports events would you like to see more often?
Do you think sports participation helps with academic performance?
Would you like to volunteer for university sports programs?
What motivates you to participate in sports?
Do you think the university provides adequate sports facilities?
What improvements would you suggest for the sports facilities?
How likely are you to recommend university sports programs to others?
Are you aware of all the sports programs offered by the university?
Do you have any suggestions to improve university sports programs?

finalMessage: Thank you for participating in this survey!
